ingredients: 3 heaping TBS smooth peanut butter, almond or cashew butter
2 TBS grated ginger (more if you like more heat)
2 tsp chili powder (more if you like more spice)
one can (14.5 oz) diced tomatoes with juice
1 C chicken broth (or veg broth if you prefer)
one can (14.5 oz) garbanzo beans, drained & rinsed
